[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [icons](./blockly.icons.md) &gt; [MutatorIcon](./blockly.icons.mutatoricon.md)

## icons.MutatorIcon class

An icon that allows the user to change the shape of the block.

For example, it could be used to add additional fields or inputs to the block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MutatorIcon extends Icon implements IHasBubble 
```
**Extends:** [Icon](./blockly.icons.icon.md)

**Implements:** [IHasBubble](./blockly.ihasbubble.md)

|  [WEIGHT](./blockly.icons.mutatoricon.weight.md) | <p><code>static</code></p><p><code>readonly</code></p> | (not declared) | The weight this icon has relative to other icons. Icons with more positive weight values are rendered farther toward the end of the block. |
